front.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Electric Systems in Health Care Facilities

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: These recommended practices will aid electrical systems designers in achieving safety of life and preservation of property through operational considerations to reduce electrical failures; to allow maintenance with a minimum need for specialized services; to present design considerations that recognize the flexibility of electrical systems in terms of layout and placement while fulfilling the requirements for proper electrical installation; and to promote coordination of design with professional associates.
